message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $200. I believe it's a fantastic deal for its value. What do you think?
Hi Alice, $200 is a bit high for me. I'm interested in the product but I'm only willing to pay $120.  What do you think?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget, but $200 is my bottom line.  I can't go any lower than that.
